Method Detail

popUpMessage

public static void popUpMessage(java.lang.String msg,
                                Activity activity)
popUpMessage, a handy method for putting a message box on the screen.

Parameters:
msg - the message to post
activity - the current activity. (Nothing will be shown if the activity is null.)

popUpChoice

public static void popUpChoice(java.lang.String msg,
                               java.lang.String posButtonText,
                               java.lang.String negButtonText,
                               OnClickListener posListener,
                               OnClickListener negListener,
                               Activity activity)
choiceBox, a handy method for putting a message box on the screen in which the user is given two options

CAVEAT: this dialog does not wait for user input, so the indication of how to respond to the selection is done via attaching listeners (passed as parameters below) to the method.

Parameters:
msg - the message to post
posButtonText - the "positive" button text
negButtonText - the "negative" button text
posListener - the listener, if any, to activate when the positive button is pressed
negListener - the listener, if any, to activate when the negative button is pressed
activity - the current activity
